co.cask.coopr.store.cluster

Class SQLClusterStoreService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • co.cask.coopr.store.cluster.SQLClusterStoreService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClusterStoreService, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

    public class SQLClusterStoreService
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
implements ClusterStoreService
    Service for getting views of the cluster store. Getting a view is a lightweight operation as no data is preloaded.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
